items.abstract: <jats:p content-type="fine-print">✓ A very rare case of a posttraumatic hematoma, localized beneath the epineurium of a branch of the median nerve, is described and a probable mechanism of its development is given. Full recovery of nerve function followed surgery.</jats:p>
title: Posttraumatic hematoma beneath the epineurium of a branch of the median nerve
